amendment.description: An amendment numbered 20 printed in House Report 116-61 to require Navigators to assist vulnerable populations including individuals with limited English proficiency and chronic illnesses.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Escobar amendment (A020) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Escobar amendment (A020) modified by unanimous consent.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Escobar amendment (A020) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A020) offered by Ms. Escobar.
